name: theropedash
description:
The Rope Dash,

is a simple click game, throw the rope and swing, break objects to score points.

Story:

this game was made on the base of Dani's game "Bad Game" created for a jam, seeing the video on youtube I wanted to try to recreate to test myself, I used construct 3 engine to play it in browser.

This is the result....
I hope you like it and have fun!
